emotes.msg: Big thing isn't it? Make sure you brace your neck when you wear it.
Hmm, if I had a whole one of these, I could make a very nice mask. It's a pity it's broken.
This mask is broken. I can do nothing with it. Perhaps you can bring it to whoever fixes Virindi masks, and they can fix it for you.
This mask is broken. I can do nothing with it. Perhaps you can bring it to whoever fixes Virindi masks, and they can fix it for you.
I can't work with this but if you can get a version that has been crafted into a full mask I may well be able to craft this into an even more detailed version of Koji's personal mask.
Or you could give this to my apprentice after you have it fixed. She'll restore it to be more like the Virindi that it was taken from.
If you can get a full, unbroken mask I may well be able to craft it into something quite extraordinary. But I cannot work with this.

A find worthy of crafting into a robe! But you still require another arm, two legs and a torso. You should be able to assemble those together without my aid. But only a master such as myself would be able to craft such objects into a fully wearable outfit.

A find worthy of crafting into a robe! But you still require another leg, two arms and a torso. You should be able to assemble those together without my aid. But only a master such as myself would be able to craft such objects into a fully wearable outfit.

A find worthy of crafting into a robe! But you still require two arms and two legs. You should be able to assemble those together without my aid. But only a master such as myself would be able to craft such objects into a fully wearable outfit.

What a fine mask! Such well-preserved fur!
You know, I really hate these creatures.
HA! HA! HA! HA! HA! HA! HA! HA! HA!
Oh, that's funny.
Wonderful craftsmanship! We mask makers are a crafty lot!
I hear Elysa holds the most wonderful costume parties. You should wear this if you're ever lucky enough to receive an invitation!
Think of the havoc you could cause in the marketplace!
Do you smell that? This thing stinks!
I wish I had two of those so I could get some sleep. My wife likes to burn the candle late.
Give me a moment and I will craft a fine costume for you from this body.
Ahh. I've been dying to get my hands on one of these specimens. Let's see what I can do.
Here you go.
Here you go. Pefect for all your spooky needs.
Incredible, I've seen the slippers made from this creature, but never it's carcass. The hide is amazingly tough for a rabbits. Hehe, there's a silly thought... Sure, why not?
I think that masks proves you are very brave. You have to be brave to wear something that silly.
You want this separate from the mask?
Very well, here you goVery well, here you go.
This is a rather interesting bandana. I wonder why they attached the eyepatch...
Ah well, to each his own. I assume you want me to fix this up for you?
If you want me to separate those, just give the mask back to me.
You wish only the hat? Very well, I'll separate them for you.
Sorry about the smell though. It should fade eventually.
This is a rather interesting hat.
Ah well, to each his own. I assume you want me to fix this up for you?
Very well, here you go.
If you want me to separate those, just give the mask back to me.
Aw, a pengui... wait, what happened to it? Ugh, someone's... modified this poor creature. Must be those damned Virindi!
Here, find out who hurt the penguins and give them a good thrashing for me!
Haha, I love these guys. It'll be difficult to make a mask out of this, but I'll give it a shot.
I don't think you'll fool anyone with this mask, but it's certainly funny.
TurnedInSnowManMask@CNote
TurnedInSnowManMask@Fez
Oh, you want a hat on this mask? Ok, give me a C-note or a...
No I have a perfectly good hat, just give me a C-note.
TurnedInSnowManMask
Huh. This is very odd. One would expect a Shadow to fade away. This must've been a powerful Shadow indeed. Now, a little preservative, a little lining... Here you go.
Huh. This is very odd. One would expect a Shadow to fade away. This must've been a powerful Shadow indeed. Now, a little preservative, a little lining... Here you go.
Those poor people. It was a good thing you put this Ruschk out of it's misery.
Ah yes, the Hollow Minion Mask. It looks like my apprentice did a passable job on this. Let me see, I'll need you to fetch me a Scarecrow Head to finish this mask.
TurnedInHeadHollowMinion
AAw, a penguin? Why did you kill a penguin? I love penguins. Nevermind, I'll make your stupid mask.
Here, and next time don't hurt our aquatic friends of the north.
Hmmmm... Which eyeholes to line up with your own eyes... Let me see...
Ah, these ones will do, I think. Here you are.
An Essence! This is a rare thing indeed! To hunt all those Shadows, and Margul as well. You've earned this mask.
With blinding speed, the Essence is shaped into a perfect likeness of the Hopeslayer.
Whoa, this thing is way to heavy to be used as a mask. It certainly is creepy though. Let me see. I can make a cast of the head like this.
Ok, here you go, it looks pretty much like the one you gave me.
Wow, that's a big chunk of snow. Oh, it's a Giant Snowman Head? Well, then let's see what we can do.
Here you are, an incredibly debilitating mask. Watch your neck with that thing.
Those poor people. It was a good thing you put this Fiun out of it's misery. Let this mask remind everyone of the horrors the vile Eaters are capable of.
Another Zombie head? Well, at least this one seems in better shape. I guess the Falatacot are good for something...
You want me to make a mask from this?
Very well... Here you go, mighty hunter.
Interesting. This helm seems rather impressively attached. Ah well, who am I to bemoan additional decoration attached without me having to add it in myself.
Here you go.
Interesting. This helm seems rather impressively attached. Ah well, who am I to bemoan additional decoration attached without me having to add it in myself.
Here you go.
Interesting. This helm seems rather impressively attached. Ah well, who am I to bemoan additional decoration attached without me having to add it in myself.
Here you go.
Amazing! So light, yet so strong...
Tsua Kagemata seems to be lost in thought, staring at the mask.

That's it! I know now what I will make from this. I will craft for you a rendition of the Dress Helm worn by the Knights of the Golden Flame back in Ispar. Those noble Knights who defend Aluvia with their lives, and work to protect us from the Shadow here in Dereth.

The chances of you finding a whole Virindi mask were highly unlikely, but it seems you have beat the odds! With this, I can replicate one of my people's ancient masks! Here, take this, and carry Koji's strength in your heart.
This mask will strike fear in to the hearts of all your enemies. Wear it proudly.
A fine specimen. Give me a few seconds here and I will complete a much improved version of my Koji line.
I call this one Koji's Fiend. This will serve you very well I think.
A fine specimen. Give me a few seconds here and I will complete a much improved version of my Koji line.
I call this one Koji's Fiend. This will serve you very well I think.
A beautiful specimen! Just a moment ...
Although you watch closely, the mask maker's hands move too quickly and skillfully to follow.

Koji, as you know, has always been a favorite subject of mine. My previous efforts have shown the horror and cruelty of the evils that Koji faced. This year I have crafted an image that I hope shows the balance, majesty and beauty of Koji herself.
There! It is complete!
What a foul creature.  I hope this head formerly belonged to one of those Drudges that plagues the Shoushi Grotto.
It almost seems as if the ranks of the undead are growing, doesn't it?  Please, be careful.
Tuskers are simple to kill, as long as you use magic against them.  As long as the Virindi use them against us, we can't lose!
Wearing the visage of an undead brings bad luck.  You have been warned.
Currently, the Ursuin are more dominant than the Mattekars.  I wonder if they will eventually hunt them to extinction?
These are rather strange creatures.  I have heard many of them have recently shown up in the desert.  Strange considering they were formerly thought to be swamp dwelling creatures.
This is a strange mask.  It seems to be transparent on only one side.  Turning it inside out completely defies all logic, and makes it's contents invisible.  Fascinating.
Here you go, a new version of the Mosswart Mask.
Here you go, a new version of the Banderling Mask.

Ugh! I should have my apprentice make this nasty thing for you. Here just take one of the masks he already cleaned. You'll notice the stitching isn't very precise, but I can't bring myself to work on these.
Yes. I see... Did you eat something funny?
On your head you say? Well, I imagine it will keep your head nice and warm.
TurnedInHeadHollowMinion@Again
TurnedInHeadHollowMinion
Why do you want to stick this on your head?
%mn looks you over with suspicion.
Are you drunk? Well, here have fun.
MaskKnathColors
You seriously want a mask made from this thing?
Well ok...
MaskKnathColors
You seriously want a mask made from this thing?
Well ok...
MaskKnathColors
You seriously want a mask made from this thing?
Well ok...

You seriously want a mask made from this thing?
Well ok...

You seriously want a mask made from this thing?
Well ok...
MaskKnathColors
Masks chafe if you wear them to long, not to mention you may have more protective head gear you wish to wear.  Perhaps this will suit you better?
Masks chafe if you wear them to long, not to mention you may have more protective head gear you wish to wear.  Perhaps this will suit you better?
Masks chafe if you wear them to long, not to mention you may have more protective head gear you wish to wear.  Perhaps this will suit you better?
Masks chafe if you wear them to long, not to mention you may have more protective head gear you wish to wear.  Perhaps this will suit you better?
Masks chafe if you wear them to long, not to mention you may have more protective head gear you wish to wear.  Perhaps this will suit you better?
Tusker backpacks are a bit morbid.  However, I hear that both Alexander the Deft and Janda Sulifiya are offering them, so here you go.
Tusker backpacks are a bit morbid.  However, I hear that both Alexander the Deft and Janda Sulifiya are offering them, so here you go.
Tusker backpacks are a bit morbid.  However, I hear that both Alexander the Deft and Janda Sulifiya are offering them, so here you go.
I'm sorry, this is to tough for me to make into a mask, for the heads of Olthoi are to difficult to carve.  Perhaps the Olthoi hunter in Arwic can make use of it.
I'm sorry, but you'll have to decorate your own.  It is my duty to make masks, not carve pumpkins.
Give me a moment and I will craft a fine costume for you from this body.
Give me a moment and I will craft a fine costume for you from this body.
Give me a moment and I will craft a fine costume for you from this body.
Give me a moment and I will craft a fine costume for you from this body.
Give me a moment and I will craft a fine costume for you from this body.
Give me a moment and I will craft a fine costume for you from this body.
Give me a moment and I will craft a fine costume for you from this body.
Give me a moment and I will craft a fine costume for you from this body.
Give me a moment and I will craft a fine costume for you from this body.
Give me a moment and I will craft a fine costume for you from this body.
Give me a moment and I will craft a fine costume for you from this body.
Give me a moment and I will craft a fine costume for you from this body.
Give me a moment and I will craft a fine costume for you from this body.
I've always had a soft spot in my heart for mites.
They taste great with a little tarragon and melted butter. You wouldn't happen to have carved off any meat when you obtained this head, would you? No? Ah well.
They wait thousands of years to seek vengeance for who knows what ancient crime, and what happens when they finally arrive on Dereth? Some tiny Isparian lops off their head! I love it!
Ridiculous creatures, these chitticks. But they're great in a stew!
They wait thousands of years to seek vengeance for who knows what ancient crime, and what happens when they finally arrive on Dereth? Some tiny Isparian lops off their head! I love it!
You'll be the belle of the ball with this fine costume!
I just learned how to make this costume. I must say, I am most impressed with myself!
Now, this is one fine costume. Go forth and scare some new arrivals!
Masks chafe if you wear them to long, not to mention you may have more protective head gear you wish to wear.  Perhaps this will suit you better?

Greetings to you on this fine day. I am Tsua, mask maker of no small ability. If you provide me with a creature's head or facial covering, I will make it into a mask that will allow you to participate in Osteth's celebration. I have handed some of my duties off to my apprentice. If you wish to receive the original version of the Mosswart or Banderling masks hand your crafted head to my apprentice.
Also, my collegues and I have begun to make new Heritage Regalia from Virindi Desecrator Masks. Get one today!
Perhaps you know of the ancient legend of Koji's Sword? If not, I am certain you can acquire a copy at the Library at Hebian-to.
During the ancient days, strong Sho warriors used to decorate their helmets with fearsome guises, in order to instill fear into their enemies.
Great, I've got your mask ready for you. Enjoy!
TurnedInSnowManMask
Hmmm, I suppose I could use this. Sure, the customer is always right after all.
Here you go.
TurnedInSnowManMask
Hey, you already turned one of these in to me. Let's finish the first one before we make a second mask.
Thanks. Wow! That looks pretty scary, I'm glad we don't have to fight these things too, hehe.
TurnedInHeadHollowMinion
I have a great idea! Go and find me a Snowman Mask.
I have a great idea! Go and find me a Snowman Mask.
This won't make a mask on it's own, I need a Scarecrow Head to complete it.
TurnedInHeadHollowMinion
Why are you giving this to me?  Just take it, and put it on your head!
